channel.title: ProjectX Insanity making an NPC Talk-Please Help
channel.description:
Hi.
I am using base: Project Insanity.
The NPC ID is: 1552(Santa)
What I want him to do: Say Merry Christmas from ProjectX when you talk to him,and he'll give you an Item.
Please Help,Matt
